description: Fractal sequence of the dispersion of the primes.
references: C. Kimberling, Fractal sequences and interspersions, Ars Combinatoria, vol. 45 p 157 1997.
mathematica: m = 30; list = Table[Length[NestWhileList[PrimePi, n, PrimeQ]], {n, m}]; Table[Length@Position[Take[list, k], list[[k]]], {k, Length[list]}] (* _Birkas Gyorgy_, Apr 04 2011 *)primefractal[n_]:= (# - PrimePi[#]) &@NestWhile[PrimePi, n, PrimeQ]; Array[primefractal, 30] (* _Birkas Gyorgy_, Apr 04 2011 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
